title: Is there a good free alternative to Gross Beat? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes there are many other great free as well as paid plugin you can use 1. volume shaper. 2. Xfer lfo 3. Dblue glitch 4. Kickstart And many more… By the way many of them are thinking how can we buy these all plugin because they are too costly but don't panic you will get it for free on our website that is on freshplugin4u (.com) Just remove the brackets while visiting our website Please upvote if you found helpful Thankyou

You might want to check out a plugin called Glitch. This plugin has a bunch of cool effects similar to Gross Beat and comes as a 32-bit VST. The plugin is a step-sequencer with the ability to cut, repeat (stutter), stretch, and much more.
